TopicTitle: Looking for people to make artwork for my military series!

Articles.Content: So, I'm making a military series in mission reports, War of the Kerbs - SAP-C VS KMK and I need some help artwork-wise for it, such as a flag for KMK, and maybe even a new flag for SAP-C (If you do, then I'll use it for my company page, too.) for details, KMK is a military Korporation thats slightly terrorist-y, but not completely, based in the westernmost region of the great desert, and for SAP-C, most of the stuff to look at is in the flag in my sig, thanks in advance for anything!
